task_definition_name: Mifos Pay: Add frequently asked question under FAQ section
description:
## Objective 
Add Frequently asked questions under FAQ section

## Description
1. Open FAQ section .
2. Add question and answer under FAQ section

#### References 
See FAQs of mifos mobile app for reference
## How to get help?
Be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/
community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
